description:
The whole “pandemic” is based on the “germ theory” of disease & scientific fraud. 

The creator of the “germ theory” Louis Pasteur recanted on his death bed, saying “the germ is nothing, terrain is everything.”

The “virus“ that they created a whole fear campaign around has never been isolated, purified or visualized. 

Under the microscope it looks identical to what our body does when it has diseased/damaged cells- these are called “Exosomes”. 

The cells’ way of communicating to other cells that there is damage occurring- an exosomal response marker.

This “damage” can be from RF microwave radiation (5G), air pollution, VACCINES, stress, FEAR, shitty (acid/mucus forming) diet, overall toxicity. 

The “virus” they are telling you to fear is the “result”, not the “cause” of illness. 

The fear & panic will make the masses more likely to accept mandated vaccines- which WILL fuck you up, along with the higher frequencies of 5G. 

They had to devise a plan to get the mASSES go accept mandating vaccines for the entire planet. Without a worldwide “problem”, there would be no “reaction”, and thus their “solution” (💉) would not carry as much importance, viability or blind acceptance- reluctant or not.  They had to find a way to sway those on the fence who are learning more about #thetruthaboutvaccines - oh my bad, I forgot that tag has been censored🤫.
